short_description: abc auftragsfertigung is a metal fabrication services company based in wolfsberg, austria.
long_description: external content and services show details for external content and services hide details for external content and services. for decades, abc has been one of the leading and most innovative contract manufacturers in machining, plastics, mechatronics, assembly and textile fields. targeted outsourcing of production processes lets our customers focus on what they themselves do best, reducing both costs and risk at a stroke. always faithful to our principles: we are the competitive advantage of our customers. seit jahrzehnten gilt abc als einer der führenden und innovativsten auftragsfertiger in den bereichen zerspanung, kunststoff, mechatronik, montage und textil. an drei standorten in kärnten arbeiten durchschnittlich 270 mitarbeiterinnen und mitarbeiter, in deren fokus vor allem der erfolg und der mehrwert für die nationalen und internationalen kundinnen und kunden von abc steht. durch innovative konzepte, gelebte kundenorientierung und unsere umfangreiche fachkompetenz stellen wir uns den komplexesten herausforderungen.
business_tags: performances & shows | goings & comings | labour market | clean rooms | iso 9001 | wood processing | textile processing
generated_description: abc auftragsfertigung, legally known as abc service & produktion integrativer betrieb gmbh, is a contract manufacturing company based in wolfsberg, carinthia, austria. founded in 1980, the company specializes in machining, plastics, mechatronics, assemblies, and textiles. abc auftragsfertigung employs approximately 240 people, with 80 percent of its workforce excluded from the general labor market due to disabilities. the company is iso 9001 certified since 1994 and has expanded to three locations in klagenfurt, villach, and wolfsberg. abc auftragsfertigung focuses on efficiency, expertise, and social responsibility, leveraging its resources to help customers reduce costs and risk while maintaining high standards of quality.
